FakerMod:Arts.NAME: Arts
FakerMod:Arts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL NL fakermod:First_Command: NL Next turn, gain !M! [E]

FakerMod:Buster.NAME: Buster
FakerMod:Buster.DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage. NL NL fakermod:First_Command: NL Attacks deal !M! more damage this turn.

FakerMod:Quick.NAME: Quick
FakerMod:Quick.DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! damage. NL NL fakermod:First_Command: NL Next turn, your first attack deals !FakerMod:m2! more damage.

FakerMod:Arrival.NAME: Arrival
FakerMod:Arrival.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain NL !M! of Strength and Dexterity.

FakerMod:BraveShine.NAME: Brave Shine
FakerMod:BraveShine.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, NL gain [E] [E] NL fakermod:Echo *Incantation.
FakerMod:BraveShine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, NL gain [E] [E] NL fakermod:Echo *Trace *On.

FakerMod:Disillusion.NAME: disillusion
FakerMod:Disillusion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E]

FakerMod:ExtraAttack.NAME: Extra Attack
FakerMod:ExtraAttack.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL fakermod:Purge.

FakerMod:GradationAir.NAME: Gradation Air
FakerMod:GradationAir.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL fakermod:Project a card. NL fakermod:Purge.

FakerMod:IdealWhite.NAME: ideal white
FakerMod:IdealWhite.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] NL and draw 1.
FakerMod:IdealWhite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E] NL and draw 1. NL fakermod:Alter into *Mind *Of *Steel.

FakerMod:InstallArcher.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance. NL NL Lose 1 Max HP. NL At the start of your turn, add *Gradation *Air to your hand. NL Retain.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Install.
This would kill me.

FakerMod:LastStardust.NAME: Last Stardust
FakerMod:LastStardust.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain NL !M! Strength and heal !FakerMod:m2!.

FakerMod:MindOfSteel.NAME: Mind of Steel
FakerMod:MindOfSteel.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, fakermod:echo *ideal *white. Replace all *Trace with *Trace *Alter then fakermod:purge.

FakerMod:Resolution.NAME: Resolution
FakerMod:Resolution.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! of Dexterity, Thorns and Artifact.
FakerMod:Resolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! of Dexterity, Thorns and Artifact. NL fakermod:Alter into *Arrival.

FakerMod:TsumukariMuramasa.NAME: Tsumukari Muramasa
FakerMod:TsumukariMuramasa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !M! more for every exhausted card this combat. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:UBW_A.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
FakerMod:UBW_A.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project NL *Unlimited *Blade *Burst. NL NL fakermod:Reality_Marble: Whenever you play non-projected Attack, fakermod:project a random 0-cost card. NL
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My whole life was Unlimited Blade Works!

FakerMod:UBW_B.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
FakerMod:UBW_B.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project NL *Oath *Under *Snow. NL NL fakermod:Reality_Marble: Whenever you play a fakermod:projected card, NL draw 1 and gain [E] NL
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My whole body was still Unlimited Blade Works...!

FakerMod:UBW_C.NAME: Unlimited Blade Works
FakerMod:UBW_C.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project NL *Unlimited *Blade *Dance. NL NL fakermod:Reality_Marble: Whenever you play a non-projected card, fakermod:project *Blade *Dance. NL
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: So as I pray, Unlimited Blade Works.

FakerMod:ULW.NAME: Unlimited Lost Works
FakerMod:ULW.DESCRIPTION: Retain & fakermod:Projected. NL Only usable against *Origin *Bullet's target. Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. Repeat for every card in your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: So as I pray, Unlimited Lost Works...!

FakerMod:Arrow.NAME: Arrow
FakerMod:Arrow.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected & Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Fatal, gain [E] and fakermod:project 1 *Arrow.

FakerMod:BladeDance.NAME: Blade Dance
FakerMod:BladeDance.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal & fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage randomly 1-3 times. NL Draw 1

FakerMod:Bow.NAME: Bow
FakerMod:Bow.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Gain !B! Block. NL fakermod:Project *Arrow.
FakerMod:Bow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Gain !B! Block. NL fakermod:Project [#78F200]Arrow+.

FakerMod:Caladbolg.NAME: Caladbolg II
FakerMod:Caladbolg.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

FakerMod:Hrunting.NAME: Hrunting
FakerMod:Hrunting.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times to random enemies.

Kanshou & Bakuya
         Alter
FakerMod:KanshouBakuyaAlter.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Enter fakermod:Melee.

Kanshou & Bakuya
       Combined

       Overedge

FakerMod:OathUnderSnow.NAME: Oath Under Snow
FakerMod:OathUnderSnow.DESCRIPTION: Retain & fakermod:Projected. NL Exhaust your draw pile. NL For every card in your exhaust pile, fakermod:project a *Blade *Dance in your draw pile then draw 1. NL End fakermod:Reality_Marble.

FakerMod:OriginBullet.NAME: Origin Bullet
FakerMod:OriginBullet.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL fakermod:Echo *Incantation. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you dealt unblocked damage, fakermod:project *Unlimited *Lost *Works.
FakerMod:OriginBullet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL fakermod:Echo *Incantation. Deal !D! damage. NL If you dealt unblocked damage, fakermod:project *Unlimited *Lost *Works+.

FakerMod:ProjectedCaliburn.NAME: Caliburn
FakerMod:ProjectedCaliburn.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Frail.

FakerMod:ProjectedExcalibur.NAME: Excalibur
FakerMod:ProjectedExcalibur.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected & Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you don't have fakermod:Saber, die next turn.

FakerMod:RuleBreaker.NAME: Rule Breaker
FakerMod:RuleBreaker.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all Block and buffs from the non-boss target.

FakerMod:Sword.NAME: Sword
FakerMod:Sword.DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

FakerMod:UnlimitedBladeBurst.NAME: Unlimited Blade Burst
FakerMod:UnlimitedBladeBurst.DESCRIPTION: Retain & fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more damage for every fakermod:projected card played this combat. NL End fakermod:Reality_Marble.

FakerMod:UnlimitedBladeDance.NAME: Unlimited Blade Dance
FakerMod:UnlimitedBladeDance.DESCRIPTION: Retain & fakermod:Projected. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies randomly 5-10 times. NL End fakermod:Reality_Marble.

FakerMod:Charisma.NAME: Charisma
FakerMod:Charisma.DESCRIPTION: Attacks deal !M! more damage for 3 turns. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:Chivalry.NAME: Chivalry
FakerMod:Chivalry.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play a fakermod:Saber card, gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

FakerMod:CommandSealCard.NAME: Command Seal
FakerMod:CommandSealCard.DESCRIPTION: Summon fakermod:Saber if you haven't. NL Choose and add 1 of 4 cards to your hand. NL Set its cost to 0 this turn.

FakerMod:DragonsCore.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Buster to your hand. NL Exhaust.
FakerMod:DragonsCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! [#78F200]Buster+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to NL ALL enemies.

FakerMod:Instinct.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals double damage.

FakerMod:InvisibleAir.NAME: Invisible Air
FakerMod:InvisibleAir.DESCRIPTION: You do not lose orb slots when taking attack damage for 3 turns

FakerMod:ManaBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots for NL 3 turns. Channel !M! AP. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:SaberArts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL NL fakermod:First_Command: NL Next turn, gain !M! [E]

FakerMod:SaberBuster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL NL fakermod:First_Command: NL Attacks deal !M! more damage this turn.

FakerMod:SaberQuick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL NL fakermod:First_Command: NL Next turn, your first attack deals !FakerMod:m2! more damage.

FakerMod:ShiningPath.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot and shuffle *Excalibur into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
FakerMod:ShiningPath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot and shuffle [#78F200]Excalibur+ into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:StrikeAir.NAME: Strike Air
FakerMod:StrikeAir.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage then apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

FakerMod:SummonSaber.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Orb slots. NL Shuffle 10 fakermod:Saber cards into your draw pile. NL At the start of your turn, fully channel fakermod:AP and draw 3. NL NL .

FakerMod:Archery.NAME: Archery
FakerMod:Archery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! Ranged attacks this turn, heal !FakerMod:m2!.

FakerMod:Avalon.NAME: Avalon
FakerMod:Avalon.DESCRIPTION: Negate ALL damage this turn. If you have fakermod:Saber, heal !FakerMod:m2!. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:AzothSword.NAME: Azoth Sword
FakerMod:AzothSword.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more for each unspent energy this combat.
FakerMod:AzothSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more for each unspent energy this combat.

FakerMod:BladeBurst.NAME: Blade Burst
FakerMod:BladeBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! more damage for every fakermod:projected card played this combat.

FakerMod:BlessedKatana.NAME: Blessed Katana
FakerMod:BlessedKatana.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:Caliburn.NAME: Caliburn
FakerMod:Caliburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you don't have fakermod:Saber, exhaust.

FakerMod:CursedKatana.NAME: Cursed Katana
FakerMod:CursedKatana.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:DestructiveKatana.NAME: Destructive Katana
FakerMod:DestructiveKatana.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card in your draw pile. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage.

FakerMod:FollowUpStrike.NAME: Follow-Up Strike
FakerMod:FollowUpStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Thorns and draw 1.

FakerMod:Forge.NAME: Forge
FakerMod:Forge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Create a random Katana card.

FakerMod:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am the bone of my sword.
Steel is my body and fire is my blood.
I have created over a thousand blades.
Unaware of loss. NL Nor aware of gain.
Withstood pain to create weapons, waiting for one's arrival.
I have no regrets. This is the only path.

Unaware of beginning.
Nor aware of the end.
Withstood pain with inconsistent weapons, my hands will never hold anything.
Yet, my flame never ends.

Unknown to Death.
Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons
Yet, those hands will never hold anything
Once seeking for the ultimate blade.
A blade of steel cutting no flesh, nor bones and neither life.
What I seek for is the clearance of resentment.

The cutting of bonds, fate and destiny.
That is, to free oneself from Karma.

Upon one's arrival are countless tools.
Carved over a thousand blades, forming a pile of swords.
My whole life was for this single swing.

FakerMod:IndependentAction.NAME: Independent Action
FakerMod:IndependentAction.DESCRIPTION: Half your HP. Heal 50% of the damage dealt with fakermod:Melee attacks for this turn. NL Enter fakermod:Melee. NL Exhaust.
FakerMod:IndependentAction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Half your HP. Heal 50% of the damage dealt with fakermod:Melee attacks for !M! turns. Enter fakermod:Melee. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
FakerMod:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Add *Strike to your hand. NL *Strikes deal double damage for 3 turns.
FakerMod:LastStand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Add *Strike to your hand. NL *Strikes deal triple damage for 3 turns.

FakerMod:LinkShot.NAME: Link Shot
FakerMod:LinkShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy *does *not *intend to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

FakerMod:ManaLink.NAME: Mana Link
FakerMod:ManaLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain X [E] for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.
FakerMod:ManaLink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain X [E] for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:MapoTofu.NAME: Mapo Tofu
FakerMod:MapoTofu.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Heal !M!. Shuffle 1 *Burn into your draw pile.

FakerMod:MetalShield.NAME: Metal Shield
FakerMod:MetalShield.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have no Block. NL Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block this turn.

FakerMod:MetalSword.NAME: Metal Sword
FakerMod:MetalSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! Attack card.

FakerMod:MightyChain.NAME: Mighty Chain
FakerMod:MightyChain.DESCRIPTION: Add 0-cost *Quick, *Arts and *Buster to your hand. NL Exhaust.
FakerMod:MightyChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 0-cost [#78F200]Quick+, [#78F200]Arts+ and [#78F200]Buster+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:MindsEye.NAME: Mind's Eye
FakerMod:MindsEye.DESCRIPTION: Add a card from your draw pile to your hand. NL Enter fakermod:Range. NL Exhaust.
FakerMod:MindsEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter fakermod:Range. NL Add a card from your draw pile to your hand.

FakerMod:MyoujingiriMuramasa.NAME: Myoujingiri Muramasa
FakerMod:MyoujingiriMuramasa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. NL Deal !M! more for every exhausted card this combat.
FakerMod:MyoujingiriMuramasa.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On *Exhaust, return this to your hand. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. Deal !M! more for every exhausted card this combat.

FakerMod:NineLivesBladeWorks.NAME: Nine Lives Blade Works
FakerMod:NineLivesBladeWorks.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL fakermod:Project a 0-cost NL *Nine *Lives. NL *Magic *Circuits reduces cost by 1 per stack.
FakerMod:NineLivesBladeWorks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL fakermod:Project a 0-cost NL [#78F200]Nine [#78F200]Lives+. NL *Magic *Circuits reduces cost by 1 per stack.

FakerMod:OriginlessCreationOfSwords.NAME:
Originless Creation
        of Swords
FakerMod:OriginlessCreationOfSwords.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your discard pile. Create *Tsumukari *Muramasa in your hand. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:PaperSword.NAME: Paper Sword
FakerMod:PaperSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you deal damage, change your enemy's intent. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:PurifyingKatana.NAME: Purifying Katana
FakerMod:PurifyingKatana.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card in your discard pile. NL Deal !D! fakermod:true_damage. NL Remove all your debuffs.

FakerMod:RapidStrike.NAME: Rapid Strike
FakerMod:RapidStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you used a *Strike his combat.

FakerMod:Reload.NAME: Reload
FakerMod:Reload.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand then draw that many. NL Exhaust.
FakerMod:Reload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust your hand then draw that many. NL Exhaust.

FakerMod:Strengthen.NAME: Strengthen
FakerMod:Strengthen.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
FakerMod:Strengthen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

FakerMod:SwordBarrel.NAME: Sword Barrel
FakerMod:SwordBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance: NL When you play a Skill, fakermod:project *Blade *Dance.
FakerMod:SwordBarrel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance: NL When you play a Skill, fakermod:project [#78F200]Blade [#78F200]Dance+.

FakerMod:TraceFractal.NAME: Trace, Fractal
FakerMod:TraceFractal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: fakermod:Project an uncommon card. NL Set its cost to 0 for this turn.

FakerMod:TraceOn.NAME: Trace On
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (2/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+ and uncommon cards. NL Can be upgraded.
Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (3/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+ and uncommon cards. NL Can be upgraded.
Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (4/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+, [#78F200]uncommon+ and rare cards. NL Can be upgraded.
Gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (5/5). NL *Trace fakermod:projects [#78F200]common+, [#78F200]uncommon+ and [#78F200]rare+ cards.

FakerMod:TriggerOff.NAME: Trigger Off
FakerMod:TriggerOff.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a fakermod:projected card, gain fakermod:Magic_Circuits (1/5).

FakerMod:TrapShot.NAME: Trap Shot
FakerMod:TrapShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy *intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

FakerMod:WithstandPain.NAME: Withstand Pain
FakerMod:WithstandPain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance. NL Whenever you lose HP, fakermod:project *Sword.
FakerMod:WithstandPain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! fakermod:Endurance. NL Whenever you lose HP, fakermod:project [#78F200]Sword+
